items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-based recommendation engine to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on the user's recent interactions.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent recommendation requests.
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA.

notes: Assumed requirement focuses on homepage recommendations; additional contexts like email or push notifications not specified.
